name: Equinox (itch) (Quicksilver9014)
description:
Please download it to play without errors the browser version has! 

Game made by me in 5 days using Universal Game Engine and Unity.
Everything made by me (some animation support from Wemakethegame). Title screen by Soco Torres.

Uses only 3 buttons to defeat your opponent and outpredict their movements to achieve victory!

Available for hire! reach out to stevensilverstein91@gmail.com for hiring inquiries as a game dev
